title: Summer Refreshing Updates
content:
Hello, we just pushed updated versions of all our docker images, find details below:

Packages Updates

The following images donâ€™t have any new release number but their packages have been updated.


  light-baseimage:0.2.4
  ubuntu-light-baseimage:0.1.6
  experimental-light-baseimage:0.1.3
  web-baseimage:0.1.10


Openldap
New version : 1.1.4 - Changelog.

Openldap Backup
New version : 0.1.9 - Changelog.

New version : 0.6.10 - Changelog.

Baseimage

title: Hi! Welcome
content: You are on our brand new blog :) We will post here docker images updates, development ideas or just anything we want to share with you. You can also follow us on Twitter.
